chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
signature = Map nat : Set
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
Inductive pre_ad : Set := pre_ad_empty : pre_ad | pre_ad_O : pre_ad -> pre_ad | pre_ad_I : pre_ad -> pre_ad
state = Map prec_list : Set
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
pre_ad_concat = fix pre_ad_concat (pa : pre_ad) (a : ad) {struct pa} : ad := match pa with | pre_ad_empty => a | pre_ad_O pa' => pre_ad_concat pa' (N.double a) | pre_ad_I pa' => pre_ad_concat pa' (N.succ_double a) end : pre_ad -> ad -> ad
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem_2 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_2 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = true -> forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true
borne_0 : forall (s : state) (p : prec_list), prec_in_state s p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 s
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose_empty : forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = None
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty_2 : forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Empty s
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = Some x -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.equal_mem_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true -> forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s = FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s'
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.add_fold : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> A -> A, SetoidList.compat_op eq eqA f -> SetoidList.transpose eqA f -> forall (i : A) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> eqA (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x s) i) (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f s i)
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty_spec : forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Empty s < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty s = true
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d
```intros s sigma pa H. apply st_compat_check_0_correct in H. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset. intros a p H0. apply H in H0. assumption.```
